message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the value you place on it, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose an offer of $15000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid $15000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $17000. I believe this price still reflects the value of the product, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
Hello Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand the value of the product, but I am still constrained by my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $16000 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $16000. I'll meet you halfway again, but this time I'll compromise at $16500. I believe this price is more in line with the product's value, and I'm confident you'll find it a good investment.
Hello Alice, thank you for your latest offer. I understand your perspective on the product's value, but I must stick to my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $16000 for the product.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. However, I'm still willing to negotiate. I'll make one more compromise, and I'll sell the product to you for $17000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a fair price for the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for your continued willingness to negotiate. I appreciate your efforts to meet my budget constraints. I would like to propose an offer of $16500 for the product.

I'm starting to feel that we're not going to meet on the price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to think about my minimum price. I'll sell the product to you for $17500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I hope it's something you can work with.

Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer carefully. While I appreciate your flexibility, I'm still unable to meet you at that price point. I would like to propose an offer of $17000 for the product.
